name: Dark Chess Tournament
description:
Dark Chess Tournament is a game of chess with "Fog of War" feature, a chess variant with incomplete information.

"Fog of War" conceals opposing armies. Enemy units become visible in proximity of one square around friendly units or within a striking move. Only the first unit under direct threat is shown. This adds a great amount of unpredictability and a scouting aspect to the game. Makes it exceptionally tactical.

The goal of the game is not to checkmate the king, but to capture it. Failing to move the king out of check or moving him into check are legal moves. It can result in a capture and loss of the game.

• Fast play, no time to get bored
• Live player versus player multiplayer with winner takes all
• Extra score for surviving the game and time bonus in async mode
• Player with the most points wins
• Compete against players of similar skill
